short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Differentiate between Salesforce orgs in open tabs using clean, colored cubes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes the icon for different Salesforce orgs.

Has different icons for Production/Developer editions, sandboxes and scratch orgs.

You can choose which color to assign to each of your orgs, or upload your own icon.

Installation note - please close all open logged in orgs before installing this addon.
